bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of all types of pathogenic evil halting and collecting inside the body. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 20: 經久不瘥，乃結聚成形 , “If not cured for an extended period of time, nodular collections assume shape”.

② Pathological Condition identical with ji ju 積聚 , accumulation and collection. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 19: 小 口微出氣十二通，以除結聚 , “Close the mouse except for a tiny opening and blow out qi twelve times. This will eliminate nodular collections ”.
